mapper.insert: insert into t_tfs_mainorg ( orgcode, orgname, productid, usertype, statusid,remark,certificatetype, certificatenumber,connect,mobiletel,buslince,createTime) values ( #{orgCode}, #{orgName}, #{productId}, #{userType},#{statusId}, #{remark}, #{certificatetype},#{certificateNumber},#{connect},#{mobileTel},#{buslince}, #{createTime})
